# Server port: On what port is the server listening - 3000 as default, can be overriden with PORT environment variable
# Cores: Number of cores to use, under testing, use 0 if you want to be safe (one core) or set to 'max' to use all available cores
# redis_enabled: Use Redis for session storage, else the default database engine is used (MySQL, SQLite...)
# page_cache_enabled: Cache dynamic pages, uses Redis (has to be enabled). Status : testing
# database_cache_enabled: Cache main database tables, uses Redis (has to be enabled). Status : testing
# session_secret: Used to encrypt sessions and passwords, change it !
# admin_password: Can be temporarily set to any value if you forget the admin password
#: The website must be reacheable from Internet for Pixlr integration to work
# production_server: Tag to identify in your code when you're running in production
